Generation III.Ruby: The leaves growing out of Grovyle 's body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This Pok é mon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
Generation III.Sapphire: This Pok é mon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no Pok é mon can ever hope to catch a fleeing Grovyle however fast they may be.
